words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Hello, how are you?
words.exampleSentenceHindi: नमस्ते, आप कैसे हैं?
words.notes: This is the most common greeting in Hindi, used throughout the day.

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Good morning, did you sleep well?
words.exampleSentenceHindi: सुप्रभात, क्या आपने अच्छी नींद ली?

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Good afternoon, welcome to our home.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: नमस्कार, हमारे घर में आपका स्वागत है।
words.notes: Namaskaar is slightly more formal than Namaste.

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Good evening, the weather is nice today.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: शुभ संध्या, आज मौसम अच्छा है।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Good night, sleep well.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: शुभ रात्रि, अच्छी नींद लें।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Goodbye, see you tomorrow.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: अलविदा, कल मिलते हैं।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: See you later at the meeting.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: बैठक में फिर मिलेंगे।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Hello, how are you today?
words.exampleSentenceHindi: नमस्ते, आज आप कैसे हैं?
words.notes: This is the formal way to ask someone how they are.

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: I am fine, thank you for asking.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: मैं ठीक हूँ, पूछने के लिए धन्यवाद।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Thank you for your help.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: आपकी मदद के लिए धन्यवाद।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Please, have a seat.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: कृपया, बैठिए।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: You're welcome, it was my pleasure to help.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: आपका स्वागत है, मदद करना मेरा सौभाग्य था।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Excuse me, can you tell me the way to the station?
words.exampleSentenceHindi: क्षमा कीजिए, क्या आप मुझे स्टेशन का रास्ता बता सकते हैं?

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: I'm sorry for being late.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: देर के लिए माफ़ कीजिए।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Welcome to India!
words.exampleSentenceHindi: भारत में आपका स्वागत है!

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Nice to meet you, I've heard a lot about you.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: आपसे मिलकर अच्छा लगा, मैंने आपके बारे में बहुत कुछ सुना है।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: My name is John.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: मेरा नाम जॉन है।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: What is your name? I'd like to introduce you to my friends.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: आपका नाम क्या है? मैं आपको अपने दोस्तों से मिलवाना चाहता हूँ।

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Have a good day, see you tomorrow!
words.exampleSentenceHindi: आपका दिन शुभ हो, कल मिलते हैं!

words.exampleSentenceEnglish: Pleased to meet you, I've heard many good things about you.
words.exampleSentenceHindi: आपसे मिलकर प्रसन्नता हुई, मैंने आपके बारे में कई अच्छी बातें सुनी हैं।
